Release notes
=============

This project uses `semantic versioning <http://semver.org/>`_.

0.2.0 (2017-01-05)
------------------

Added
^^^^^

- Added Table class that acts like a mutable set interface to a SQL
  table.

Changed
^^^^^^^

- Shuffled class hierarchy.

0.1.0 (2016-12-25)
------------------

Initial release.
